problem.markdown:
Based on what you already know, which of the following paradigms can Snap! be? [x] Functional Programming [x] Imperative Programming [x] OOP [ ] None of the above
[explanation] Snap! has the ability to be not only the three programming options in the list, but all four paradigms. [explanation]
problem.p: Based on what you already know, which of the following paradigms can Snap! be?

div.p: Snap! has the ability to be not only the three programming options in the list, but all four paradigms.
